PackageInfo.name: Composite.Community.Blog
PackageInfo.author: Composite A/S
PackageInfo.description: Allows you to set up one or more blogs on a website. Entries can be filtered by month/year or tag, commented on, shared with popular online communities and services. Supports RSS export.Allows you to set up one or more blogs on a website. Entries can be filtered by month/year or tag, commented on, shared with popular online communities and services. Supports RSS export.
